title: Senior Product Designer
jobDesc: ASAI Management Services Ltd. (AMSL) is a fully owned entity of ASA International Group PLC (ASAI), a multinational conglomerate enlisted in London Stock Exchange. ASAI delivers microfinance services to 2.2 million clients in 13 countries in Asia and Africa. Among other services, AMSL also develops, implements and maintains all software necessary for entities of ASAI in different countries. AMSL IT team is comprised of 70+ professionals divided into Programming, Quality Assurance, Implementation Management, and Infrastructure Management teams.
jobResponsibility: Develop financial application writing efficient code using .net technologies. Writing testable program following proper architectural design Maintain proper documentations following standard guidelines Working on enhancement, bug fixing and change request on existing application.R&D on new tools, technologies and methodologies.
education: Minimum Bachelor in Computer Science / Engineering
experience: At least 3 years in required field

title: DevOps Engineer

title: UX/UI Designer

jobResponsibility: You`ll also ensure that applications are responsive, and work with graphic designers to design web features, among other things. Please do not apply if you don`t have direct PHP(Laravel) & React.js development experience.

title: App Developer (Android-1 & ios-1)
jobDesc: Mr. Healer is a leading digital healthcare service provider/telemedicine company in Bangladesh. We are looking for a skilled Android App Developer who can manage the front-end work of mobile applications with ownership and multi-task mentality. As an Android App Developer, you will be responsible for designing and developing user interfaces, ensuring seamless integration of all application components, and staying up-to-date with emerging trends and technologies in full-stack development.
jobResponsibility: Collaborate with back-end developers to ensure seamless integration of front-end and back-end components. Ensure optimal performance and scalability of applications
education: Minimum Bachelor degree in Computer Sciencet
